classmethod get_config_schema()[source]

Get the configuration schema for this plugin.

Return type:

dict[str, ConfigType]

Returns:

A dictionary describing the expected configuration parameters.

Examples

>>> return {
>>>     "test_dir": {
>>>         "type": str,
>>>         "description": "Directory to save test data files",
>>>         "required": False,
>>>     }
>>> }
